description.0: A jade pearl shrouded in the light of the moon. Even in the coldest winter night, its gentle warmth lingers like a song.

0.0: Max HP increases by <cryo>10%</cryo>. When triggering Lunar reactions or inflicting Lunar Reaction DMG on opponents, the equipping character will recover <cryo>14</cryo> Energy, and receive the Bountiful Sea's Sacred Wine effect for 12s: Max HP increases by an additional <cryo>14%</cryo>, CRIT DMG from Lunar Reaction DMG increases by <cryo>60%</cryo>. The Energy recovery effect can be triggered at most once every 18s, and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.

The Energy recovery effect can be triggered at most once every 18s, and can be triggered even when the equipping character is off-field.
